name: arukoh's GitHub Page
body: ## My Repositories ### Ruby Gems rubygems.org/profiles/arukoh | Name | Description | GitHub Page | |------|-------------|-------------| | omnistore | The storage library | site link | | signauth | The signature authentication library | site link | | orm_adapter-simple_record | ORM adapter for AWS SimpleDB | site link | | orm_adapter-dynamoid | ORM adapter for AWS DynamoDB | site link | ### Sinatra Apps | Name | Description | Repository | WebSite | |------|-------------|------------|---------| | bigwaf | Badge-like ImageSVG Generator With Any Filter | site link |site link | | Hooker | Endpoint for Web Hook | site link | - | ### Sample Codes github.com/samples-of-arukoh
